Description: This template is used to create your instance and security group as part of the EC2 Quickstart.

KeyName.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable access to the instance
KeyName.ConstraintDescription: Must be the name of an existing EC2 KeyPair.

ConnectionLocation.Description: The IP address range that can be used to connect to the EC2 instances
ConnectionLocation.ConstraintDescription: Must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.

OperatingSystem.Description: Operating system used to select the appropriate regional Amazon Machine Image.

ImageId.Description: The Amazon Machine Image ("AMI") used to start the EC2 Instance.

SecurityGroupPort.Description: Port number Range to be set in the Security Group ingress rules.
